data.title: Symantec Data Loss Prevention Services
data.meta_description: Stop or start Symantec Data Loss Prevention servicesÂ to perform administrative tasks.
data.text:
Symantec DLP Enforce Connector

This service is hosted and runs on the data node of a Network Discover Cluster. The data node communicates with the Monitor Controller through the Enforce Connector Service.

Symantec DLP Detection Server

This service is hosted and runs on the data node and worker nodes of a Network Discover Cluster. The data node communicates with worker nodes through the Detector Connector Service. This service also helps with the entire scanning activity.

When this service is hosted on the data node, you must ensure that this service is never shutdown instantaneously by aborting its process.
